enchantment.cenchants.dueling.desc: Hitting an enemy will knock away other nearby foes
enchantment.cenchants.rampage.desc: Slaying enemies bestows buffs upon you
enchantment.cenchants.triumph.desc: Slaying enemies refills health and hunger
enchantment.cenchants.lethality.desc: Increased damage to foes with heavier armor
enchantment.cenchants.inferno.desc: Hitting an enemy ignites nearby foes
enchantment.cenchants.sorcery.desc: Taking damage will randomly bestow buffs
enchantment.cenchants.zap.desc: Hitting a target launches bouncing lightning
enchantment.cenchants.volley.desc: Hitting a target summons a rain of arrows above them
enchantment.cenchants.hunter.desc: Mark targets by hitting them, hit them again to gain boons
enchantment.cenchants.tranquilize.desc: Hitting a target will send them to sleep after a short delay
enchantment.cenchants.frost.desc: Your attacks deeply chill their target, slowing them
enchantment.cenchants.shielding.desc: Gain absorption when out of combat
enchantment.cenchants.flame_walker.desc: Leave a trail of flame after taking damage
enchantment.cenchants.suicide.desc: Hitting an enemy causes you to explode
enchantment.cenchants.darkness.desc: Gain buffs in the shadows, but burn in the sunlight
enchantment.cenchants.bite.desc: Spawn angry wolves around your target
enchantment.cenchants.combo.desc: Hitting an enemy repeatedly will summon lightning
enchantment.cenchants.barrage.desc: Repeated strikes allow you to launch arrows instantly
enchantment.cenchants.lightweight.desc: Equip and block with greater speed
enchantment.cenchants.snap.desc: Leave a trail of fangs after hitting an enemy
